channel.title: Posts on diaRy
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on diaRy

item.title: Reapportion spatial overlaps between South African census boundaries: 2001 and 2011
item.description: Introduction The documents accompanying the South African census of 2011 state that demarcations of geographical boundaries underwent a number of changes at provincial and municipal boundaries relative to those used for the 2001 census. This make it difficult to compare the 2011 census and the preceding census at this level. The aim of this exercise is to determine what proportion of the preceding census boundaries are included in the boundaries of the latest census.

item.title: Stata to R - BMI example
item.description: Note: This exercise is part of re-writing the SALDRU Stata course in R for DataFirst.Therefore, all descriptions, interpretation and logical approach comes from the original course and all I did is to write the R code. Introduction In this exercise, we follow the BMI examples in the SALDRU Stata course. The exercise investigate determinants of BMI and in doing so address the following questions. What happens to your BMI as you get older?
